sentences.en: Do not undertake strenuous exercise for a few hours after a meal to allow food to digest.
sentences.cn: 饭后几个小时不要从事剧烈运动，以便食物能够消化。

sentences.en: Don't give the baby meat to eat, because he cannot digest it.
sentences.cn: 别给这个孩子肉吃, 因为他不消化.

sentences.en: Each Reader's Digest condensed book is an abbreviation of an originally longer work.
sentences.cn: 《读者文摘》都是较长原著的缩写本.

sentences.en: Fermentation also makes bread dough rise and helps us digest food.
sentences.cn: 利用发酵也可以使做面包的面团发起来,还能帮助我们消化食物.

sentences.en: Humans cannot digest plants such as grass.
I read only this digest of the novel.
sentences.cn: 我只读过该小说的摘要.

sentences.en: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.cn: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

sentences.en: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.cn: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.en: Some foods digest more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些食物较其它食物容易消化.

sentences.en: The function of the stomach is to digest food sufficiently to enable it to pass into the intestine.
sentences.cn: 胃的功能是充分消化食物,以便让其进入肠道.

sentences.en: The organization publishes a regular digest of environmental statistics.
sentences.cn: 该组织定期出版一份环境统计数据摘要。

sentences.en: This conduct is more than I can digest.
This rich food doesn't digest easily.
sentences.cn: 这种油腻的食物不易消化。

sentences.en: You should digest what he said.
sentences.cn: 你应该仔细体会他说的话.

words.tran_cn: 做摘要者；助消化食品；汇编者；蒸炼器

trans.tran_en: a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc
to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
